about-to-delete-account: You're about to delete your account
delete-account-message1: Your account will be deleted immediately.
delete-account-message2: By deleting your account you will no longer receive email alerts.
delete-account-message3: Also, you won't be able to retrieve past activities, even if a new account with your former e-mail is created.
